name: The Enchanting Islands
summary: Help a young enchantress save a fairy-tale realm from a wicked curse in The Enchanting Islands, a captivating 3-in-a-row puzzle adventure! Swap game pieces to make matching groups of three or more to gather elements for Alice and watch as glistening pools and vibrant meadows burst back to life. Play The Enchanting Islands before this magical land is lost to darkness forever.
